sentence.Network_en: The injured man was lying motionless on his back.
sentence.Network_cn: 那名受伤的男子一动不动地仰面躺在那里。

sentence.Network_en: Fish and seaweed rose, caught motionless in the surging water.
sentence.Network_cn: 鱼和海藻浮起来，在汹涌的水流中动弹不得。

entry.def: Someone or something that is motionless is not moving at all.

example.ex: He has this ability of being able to remain as motionless as a statue, for hours on end...
example.tran: 他有本事连续几个小时一动不动，像雕塑一样。

sentences.sentence: "the inertia of an object at rest"

auth_sentence.content: Prior stood motionless with the effort to control himself.

sentences.en: A silent movie doesn’t mean it is motionless.
sentences.cn: 无声电影并非没有动作。

sentences.en: I urged him to rest,but he remained motionless.
sentences.cn: 我叫他休息,可他仍然不动。

sentences.en: She sat motionless,waiting for their decision.
sentences.cn: 她坐在那里一动不动,等候他们作出决定。
